description: This file defines functions and macros for retrieving the length of a property within a map or string in CMake. It provides utility methods for handling properties associated with maps, particularly their lengths, which are useful for configuration and build scripting.

methods.name: map_property_length
methods.description: Function that retrieves the length of a specified property in a map, using map_tryget to obtain the property value.

methods.name: map_property_length
methods.description: Macro that retrieves the global property value for a map property and calculates its length.

methods.name: map_property_string_length
methods.description: Macro that retrieves the global property value for a map property and calculates its string length.
